transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Settings
Predefined Text

4 min
overview & purpose the pre defined text contains content that your customers can add in any of the product designs there text mostly include greetings, wishes, slogans, quote and more this is a kind of personalized tool that we have added to our system configuration enable feature to enable the pre defined text feature, go to the admin >> designer studio >> studio settings >> general tab, search ‘ enable predefined quotes for text element ’ and enable the setting this will show the predefined text in designer studio in the following manner – add a predefined text for adding a new predefined text, navigate to the admin panel >> designer studio >> studio settings >> predefined text and click on the add button using this add a predefined text for the system keep the text product specific or category specific, give a title and enter the pre defined text add predefined text category for adding a new category, navigate to the admin panel >> designer studio >> studio settings >> predefined text and click on the predefined text category button here, specify the user type, enter the predefined category text name and save you can also view all the predefined text belonging to a particular group however, you cannot delete any category until it has predefined text assigned to it
Did this page help you?
